column4: hi just want to see if this is possible.  I have a bunch of window open: brower (with tabs), natuatus windows, totem, ETC.  i need to reboot.  Is there a way i can save this setting of all the windows and positions and return to it upon reboot?
sessions, your DE should have them
hi thanks for the response.  I'm kinda new, can you elaborate on "DE"
Desktop Environment, gnome, KDE xfce, lxde, colorbox
